constraints_details.constraints_layer_description: AAS Name: Kingston Hill - Designated in UDP 1998
NEIPOL Name: MC1  Maldens and Coombe
TPAREA Ref: MAC.06.56Tree ref: A2Tree category: ADetails: M&C Order no: 06 Year: 1956

AIRCZ Type:: Heathrow Planning Consultation Zone: All buildings, structures, erections and works exceeding 90 metres in height (295.3 feet)Contact: The Safeguarding Department, Heathrow Airport Limited, c/o Planning Services, First Point, Buckingham Gate, Gatwick Airport, West Sussex, RH6 0NT
LBCASE LB Address: KINGSTON PLACERICHMOND PARKKINGSTONLB Grade: GD2LB Ref: 1/40,2/40

application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
description: T.1 Yew - Crown lift to 0.5m above wall.T.2 Oak - 2m Lateral reduction from neighbouring property and shape into remaining crown, 10-15% crown thin, deadwood & crown lift to 4m from ground level.T.3 Magnolia - 2m Lateral reduction to boundary.G.4 Leyland Cypress x3 - Trim back as hard as possible while retaining green growth.T.5 Whitebeam - 2-2.5m Holistic crown reduction to previous points.T.6 Yew - Remove lowest to limbs at 3.5 and 4m to north, to clear basketball net.T.7 Lawson Cypress - Remove lowest branches up to 3.5m (area of dense growth), cutting back to main stem.T.8 Norway Maple - Remove lowest 4 x small diameter branches, over flowerbed and lawn.
